title: BMAD_Openclaw Configuration
description: Team customization config for BMAD_Openclaw. Place bmad.config.yaml in your project root — the orchestrator reads it at session start. No file = current behavior unchanged.

version.description: Config schema version. Must be 1 for v1.

company.description: Company context injected into all agent prompts as background knowledge.

name.description: Company name. Resolves {{company_name}} in agent prompts.

conventions.description: Team conventions and norms (multi-line ok). Resolves {{conventions}}.

agents.description: Agent persona overrides. Keys must match canonical role slugs.

additionalProperties.description: Override for a specific agent role.

name.description: Display name override. Replaces the agent default name.

emoji.description: Emoji override. Replaces the agent default emoji.

openclaw_agent_id.description: OpenClaw agent ID used for sessions_spawn. Falls back to role slug if not set.

persona_append.description: Text APPENDED to the agent Persona section. Never replaces base persona.
